column4: one quick question is there a difference between the 7.10 I can download now and the official release in two weeks or so?
there will me updates between now and then that will be in the official release
well I just thought maybe the release in two weeks only means that it isn't "officialy supported" until then and that in general the files will be the same
ok aside from the updates between now and then (which I can update until then anyhow)
